724229f-a.text:
Water Street, west side, north from Broad Street, to and including Coenties Slip. Also shown is Broad Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Water Street. (Direction of Water Street, is arbitrarily set to run North and South.)
March 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
724229f-a.folder: Water Street & Broad Street, Manhattan, NY
